entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Port Hawkesbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:56 a.m. ADT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 3.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Hawkesbury Airport 2:00 PM ADT Thursday 30 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.3°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 67 %
Dewpoint: -2.3°C
Wind: SSE 24 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 10 cm except 20 cm in areas of heaviest snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
